SELECT
org_id AS orgId, customerCity, customerProvince,
SUM(callOutCount) AS callOutCount, #致电次数 SUM(callOutConnectCount) AS callOutConnectCount,#致电接通次数 CONVERT(SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(callOutConnectDuration))),CHAR) AS callOutConnectDuration, #致电接通时长 #致电通话时长/致电接通次数 平均致电通话时长（时:分:秒） IFNULL(SEC_TO_TIME(FLOOR(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(callOutConnectDuration))/SUM(callOutConnectCount))),'00:00:00') AS callOutConnectDurationAvg, #致电接通率 致电次数*100/致电接通次数 CONVERT(SUM(callOutConnectCount) *100/SUM(callOutCount) ,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS callOutConnectRate, #平均每日通话时长（时:分:秒) 致电通话时长/天数 CONVERT(SEC_TO_TIME(CONVERT(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(callOutConnectDuration)) / (TO_DAYS(#{params.normalDate1}) - TO_DAYS(#{params.normalDate})+1),DECIMAL(18,0))),CHAR) AS bridgeDurationDayAvg, createTime FROM `region_out_statistics` WHERE 1=1
and createTime >=#{params.normalDate} AND createTime <=#{params.normalDate1}
and org_id IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_organization WHERE path LIKE CONCAT(( SELECT path FROM sys_organization WHERE id = #{params.orgId} ), '%') )
GROUP BY customerProvince,customerCity,cno
order by ${sort} ${order}
ORDER BY orgId
